What's Bybit?

Bybit is a popular cryptocurrency exchange platform known for its robust trading features and user-friendly interface. The platform offers:

  • Spot and derivatives trading
  • High-performance trading engine
  • Advanced order types and trading tools
  • Institutional-grade security

API Key Setup Process

follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning="Never share your API keys with anyone. We use industry-standard encryption to secure your credentials." %}

1 Create a Bybit Account

If you donâ€™t already have a Bybit account, please sign up here.

2 Navigate to API Key

  1. Log in to your Bybit account.
  2. Click on your profile icon in the top-right corner.
  3. Select "API" from the dropdown menu.

3 Create API Key

  1. Click "Create New Key"
  2. Choose "System generated API Keys"

4 Configure API Settings

  1. Set the API key permissions to "Read-Write".
  2. Enable "Only IPs with permissions granted are allowed to access the OpenAPI".
  3. Past our server's IP address: {{server_ip}}
  4. Scroll down and enable "Unified Trading".
  5. Click "Submit" to see your API Keys.

IMPORTANT: Ensure you copy your secret key before clicking Understood.

Complete Integration

Once you have your API keys, return to our platform's Automate section and use them to link your Binance account with our automation system. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
